name: #Templar Control
desc: The Templars exert all-pervasive control over every aspect of the markets they hold. Increases stability and removes stability penalty from smuggling. Creates some demand for marines to enforce order.

name: Rebellion
desc:
A rebellion is ongoing on $market.

- Stability reduced by $stabilityPenalty
- Increased demand for marines, hand weapons and supplies; sales to $market will strengthen rebels or government depending on channel

name: Raiding
desc: Hostile raiding fleets are active in the system, disrupting commerce and other activities.
